lines.text: After all, a weed is just a plant in a place you don't want it to be.

[to Miss Marple]
You're a real prototype, aren't you? Most of Grandame's friends are absolutely last year's turnips, but you're different, aren't you?
And this Edgar Lawson was yelling all the time you were down here?
Uh, he was fruitcaking for England up there.
